name: Breach of Space (CalciteGames)
description:
In Breach of Space, defeat the evil corporation taking over your home planet. Distract and sabotage the colony to shut it down and force the robotic staff to leave your home for good.

Sabotage
Create chaos in the space colony by sabotaging the environment around you!

Evade
Sneak around the environment to avoid detection from the robotic staff looking to capture you!

Escape
Sabotage your environment and evade detection to ultimately escape the facility!

COMING SOON - MARCH 11, 2022
